meanings.definition: Relating to or involving more than one sense.
meanings.sent1: The intersensory experience of tasting and smelling the delicious food made the meal even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: The intersensory activity of listening to music while watching a dance performance enhanced the overall artistic experience.
meanings.sent3: The intersensory mix-up of wearing mismatched socks and shoes made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The intersensory connection between the colorful painting and the soothing music created a harmonious atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The intersensory sensation of feeling the warm sun on your skin while hearing the birds chirping was truly delightful.

meanings.definition: Involving the interaction between different senses.
meanings.sent1: The intersensory communication between the teacher's words and the visual aids helped the students understand the lesson better.
meanings.sent2: The intersensory perception of seeing the lightning and hearing the thunder at the same time fascinated the children.
meanings.sent3: The intersensory mix-up of smelling like flowers but looking like a rock confused the curious puppy.
meanings.sent4: The intersensory relationship between the smell of fresh bread and the sound of crackling crust evoked memories of home.
meanings.sent5: The intersensory contrast between the cold ice cream and the warm apple pie created a unique culinary experience.
